channel.title: Need help with this error!
channel.description:
Alright so i'm doing asshole_rule's guide for ancient curses found here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,490285.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,490285.0.html[/url]
And as i'm going along adding the code I get this error
[code=javascript]src\server\model\players\combat\CombatAssistant.java:1825: error: illegal start of expression private void applyLeeches(int index) { ^ src\server\model\players\combat\CombatAssistant.java:1825: error: illegal start of expression private void applyLeeches(int index) { ^ src\server\model\players\combat\CombatAssistant.java:1825: error: ';' expected private void applyLeeches(int index) { ^ src\server\model\players\combat\CombatAssistant.java:1825: error: ';' expected private void applyLeeches(int index) { ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Any ideas?

item.title: Need help with this error!
item.dc:creator: @Wes_The_Nes Wes The Nes
item.description:
@Wes_The_Nes wrote:

Nope still didn’t work and I still need help with this.

Alright I’ve fixed the private void error. Now I just have this

src\server\model\players\Client.java:73: error: cannot find symbol private Curse curse = new Curse(this); ^ symbol: class Curse location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1514: error: cannot find symbol public Curse getCurse() { ^ symbol: class Curse location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:73: error: cannot find symbol private Curse curse = new Curse(this); ^ symbol: class Curse location: class Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

The error has now moved files…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this error!
item.dc:creator: @Wes_The_Nes Wes The Nes
item.description:
@Wes_The_Nes wrote:

The private void thing is the start of the expression this is the code its in so i cant add the ; to it since the { needs to be there

private void applyLeeches(int index) { if (c.lastTime > 0) { c.lastTime--; return; } if (c.curseActive[10]) { if (Misc.random(19) == 0) { leechAttack(index); c.lastTime++; return; } } if (c.curseActive[11]) { if (Misc.random(19) == 0) { leechRanged(index); c.lastTime++; return; } } if (c.curseActive[12]) { if (Misc.random(19) == 0) { leechMagic(index); c.lastTime++; return; } } if (c.curseActive[13]) { if (Misc.random(19) == 0) { leechDefence(index); c.lastTime++; return; } } if (c.curseActive[14]) { if (Misc.random(19) == 0) { leechStrength(index); c.lastTime++; return; } } if (c.curseActive[16]) { if (Misc.random(19) == 0) { leechSpecial(index); c.lastTime++; return; } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this error!
item.dc:creator: @methodd methodd
item.description:
@methodd wrote:

Mabey at the end of private void applyLeeches(int index) add a ; example:

Do this for every line that is missing it then reply with what happens.
